scripts.start: npm run build:happ && npm run start:host
scripts.start:info: npm run build:happ && RUST_LOG=host=info npm run start:host
scripts.start:debug: npm run build:happ && RUST_LOG=host=debug npm run start:host
scripts.build: npm run build:happ && npm run build:host
scripts.check: npm run check -w host && npm run check -w happ
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit -w host && npm run test:unit:no-run -w happ
scripts.sweetest: RUST_LOG=${RUST_LOG:-warn} WASM_LOG=${WASM_LOG:-warn} npm run build:happ && npm run sweet:test
scripts.clean: npm run clean:rust:deep && npm run clean:ui
scripts.clean:rust: npm run clean:rust -w host && npm run clean:rust -w happ
scripts.clean:rust:deep: npm run clean:rust:deep -w host && npm run clean:rust:deep -w happ
